courses.title: AI for Making Office Tasks Easy
courses.heading: Office Genie: AI-Powered Productivity for Modern Workplaces
courses.description: Boost office productivity with this AI-driven course designed to automate repetitive tasks and implement smart solutions like document summarization and scheduling. Learn to build a custom AI assistant through real-world projects such as task schedulers and invoice processors. Enjoy 80% hands-on training, certification, and access to advanced AI tools like Power Automate and Notion AI.

modules.title: Building Custom AI Assistants
description: Excel and report automation using Python.

modules.title: AI in Action: Real-Time Projects
description: Create an AI-driven office workflow solution.

courses.title: Cloud Computing Essential
courses.heading: Cloud 360:Mastering Modern Cloud Solutions
courses.description: Gain essential cloud computing skills with this practical course. Learn to understand cloud infrastructure, deploy secure applications, and automate workflows using cloud DevOps tools. Work on real-world projects like web app deployment and file-sharing systems. Includes certification, credentials for AWS/Azure/Google Cloud, and access to cloud labs for hands-on training.

modules.title: Foundations of Cloud Mastery
description: Introduction to cloud services and trends.
Understanding cloud service models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS).

courses.title: Machine Learning
courses.heading: ML Prodigy: Mastering Predictive Models and Algorithms
courses.description: Master machine learning algorithms and build predictive models. This course includes supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning basics, and real-world ML projects.

courses.title: Data Science
courses.heading: Data Wizardry: Transforming Data into Actionable Insights
courses.description: Analyze and visualize data to derive actionable insights. This course covers data wrangling, exploratory data analysis, statistical modeling, and data visualization.

courses.title: Generative AI
courses.heading: Creative AI: Unlocking the Power of Generative Models
courses.description: Explore generative models like GANs and create AI-generated content. This course includes text and image generation, GANs, and real-world applications.

modules.title: Generative AI Applications
description: Real-world use cases of generative AI.

courses.title: Python for All
courses.heading: Python Mastery: From Basics to Advanced Applications
courses.description: Learn Python programming from basics to advanced concepts. This course includes object-oriented programming, data analysis, and web development with Flask/Django.

courses.title: Remote Sensing and GIS
courses.heading: Earth Insights: Mastering Remote Sensing Technologies
courses.description: Understand remote sensing technologies and their applications. This course covers satellite image processing, GIS integration, and real-world applications.

modules.title: GIS Integration
description: Integrating remote sensing data with GIS.

courses.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
courses.heading: Language AI: Building Text-Based Applications
courses.description: Dive into natural language processing and build text-based applications. This course includes text preprocessing, sentiment analysis, and language models.

modules.title: Text Preprocessing
description: Removing stop words and text normalization.

courses.title: Computer Vision
courses.heading: Vision AI: Mastering Image Analysis and Processing
courses.description: Learn computer vision techniques to analyze and process images. This course includes image processing basics, object detection, and deep learning for vision.
